lead_paragraph: Pssssst. Wanna know who's going to win that big first-round matchup between No. 1 Novak Djokovic and 2009 U.S. Open champion Juan Martin del Potro at the Rio de Janeiro Olympics?

headline.print_headline: Wanna Know Djokovic vs. Del Potro Result? Check ITF Website
